title: Remaining battery charge and battery usage don't add up to 100%
content:
When I check the battery usage at, lets say 50% remaining battery level I would expect that all apps listed in the "Battery usage" sum up to a 50%, so that together its 100%.

Percentages on my phone never sum up to 100% (usage of all apps is only about 20% at 50% of battery level), suggesting that some usage is unregistered by the app.
It's it correct and the system is actually not recorded as battery usage?
